welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Al Harah, Syria! We are delighted to have you here in our charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Al Harah has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Masada Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Masada Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rosh Pina Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rosh Pina Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
